display_long_description:
This isn’t football – it’s HEXBALL.

Step into a free-to-play VR arena sport where chaos, skill, and mayhem rule. Built for players, not the rulebook, HEXBALL throws you into neon cages where rebounds go wild, trick shots bend physics, and every brawl feels like a highlight reel.

[media]
Take it up a notch with Premier League kits and collectibles. Rep your club, customize your arena, and crank up the rivalry.

🔥 Game Modes:

1v1 Duels: Pure skill – just you and your rival.

3-Player Brawls: Total chaos with rebounds and power-ups.

Skill Challenges: Quick drills to flex trick shots.

[media]
Matches last just two minutes – quick, intense, and impossible to put down. Slam rebounds, launch trick shots, ride bee-drones, and pull off last-second saves while laughing, trash-talking, and flipping the arena upside down on your way to victory.

[media]
🎮 Feels Amazing in VR: Built for Meta Quest – true multiplayer fun, not a tech demo.
⚡ Skill Beats Luck: Every bounce and goal is player-powered.
🤪 Unpredictable Chaos: Power-ups flip matches fast – stay sharp.
👟 No Grind, No Rules: Pure arena sport, big plays, bigger moments.

Jump in solo or with friends, fill lobbies, own every mode.
Play loud. Break the rules. THIS IS HEXBALL.
